languages.text: {n}С лица ксеноса слетает маска спокойствия — с витиеватой взбешенной тирадой на чужом языке ксенос хватается за оружие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Из-под черного шлема доносится взбешенная витиеватая тирада — и ксенос хватается за оружие.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The mask of composure vanishes from the xenos's face — spitting out a florid, vehement tirade, he draws his weapon.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}С лица ксеноса слетает маска спокойствия — с витиеватой взбешенной тирадой на чужом языке ксенос хватается за оружие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The mask of composure evaporates from the xenos's face — spitting out a flowery, vehement tirade, he draws his weapon.{/n}
{n}The mask of composure evaporates from the xenos's face — spitting out a flowery, vehement tirade, he draws his weapon.{/n}
{n}The mask of composure vanishes from the xenos's face — spitting out a florid, vehement tirade, he draws his weapon.{/n}
{n}The mask of composure vanishes from the xenos's face — spitting out a florid, vehement tirade, he draws his weapon.{/n}
{n}The mask of composure vanishes from the xenos's face — spitting out a florid, vehement tirade, he draws his weapon.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La máscara de compostura desaparece del rostro del xenos. Prepara su arma entre insultos de lo más variados.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mask of composure vanishes from the xenos's face — spitting out a florid, vehement tirade, he draws his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La máscara de compostura desaparece del rostro del xenos. Prepara su arma entre insultos de lo más variados.{/n}

languages.text: {n}异形脸上故作平静的表情消失了。他愤怒地咆哮着，嘴里吐出一长串叽里咕噜的话，拔出了武器。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mask of composure vanishes from the xenos's face — spitting out a florid, vehement tirade, he draws his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}异形脸上故作平静的表情消失了。他愤怒地咆哮着，嘴里吐出一长串叽里咕噜的话，拔出了武器。{/n}

languages.text: {n}異種族の顔から冷静な面持ちが消え――大げさで激しい暴言を吐きながら、武器を抜いた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mask of composure vanishes from the xenos's face — spitting out a florid, vehement tirade, he draws his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族の顔から冷静な面持ちが消え――大げさで激しい暴言を吐きながら、武器を抜いた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Maske der Selbstbeherrschung weicht aus dem Gesicht des Xenos – er stößt wilde Flüche aus und zieht seine Waffe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mask of composure vanishes from the xenos's face — spitting out a florid, vehement tirade, he draws his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Maske der Selbstbeherrschung weicht aus dem Gesicht des Xenos – er stößt wilde Flüche aus und zieht seine Waffe.{/n}

languages.original_text: {n}The mask of composure vanishes from the xenos's face — spitting out a florid, vehement tirade, he draws his weapon.{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'expression calme du xénos se décompose immédiatement. Il dégaine son arme en crachant une tirade aussi brutale que sophistiquée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mask of composure vanishes from the xenos's face — spitting out a florid, vehement tirade, he draws his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'expression calme du xénos se décompose immédiatement. Il dégaine son arme en crachant une tirade aussi brutale que sophistiquée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zenonun suratındaki sakinlik aniden siliniyor. Hiddetle birkaç söz sarf edip silahını çekiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mask of composure vanishes from the xenos's face — spitting out a florid, vehement tirade, he draws his weapon.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zenonun suratındaki sakinlik aniden siliniyor. Hiddetle birkaç söz sarf edip silahını çekiyor.{/n}
